flawed_nl_solution:
Tory sold 12 packs + 7 packs = <<12+7=19>>19 packs to his family members.
Tory sold 19 packs + 5 packs = <<19+5=25>>25 packs in total
He has to sell 50 packs - 25 packs = <<50-25=25>>25 more packs of cookies to reach his target
#### 25

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 24, not 25. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
